> [{quoted}](name=THE HUNTERS,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nlGMW9kM,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-09-02T01:54:51.362+0000)so you just expect me to just sit there and let them ruin my game

No, I don't expect that, and I know for a fact that that's not the only course of action Riot expects. There is a whole range of polite options between sitting idly and spewing insults. "Hey, guys -- knock it off please, okay?", for example. Because let's be honest -- if they want to ruin your game, they will. Ranting at them won't help, and all it does is make everyone a little angrier and a little less happy.

Even telling someone to shut up every now and then won't get you in trouble.

Spending an entire gaming telling someone to shut up, calling them a bitch (or bich, in this case -- the meaning is obvious), and calling them trash though? That WILL get you in trouble.

There's reasonable frustration, and then there's needless and insulting venting. This is the latter.

>
> but how come i get the ban and not them like riot says trolls and scripters get punished too but i dont see any improvement from riots side

If you are not yourself a troll or a scripter, you will not often see the punishments being handed out, as account punishments are kept fairly private -- often the single person who triggers the punishment with their report will see a message, but that's about it. Riot does come down pretty hard on trolling and scripters any time they are identified.

>but people can get mad sometimes that doesnt mean that they are so bad and trolls

This is why there are several warnings, and why the system is fairly forgiving. Once those warnings are used up, however, the system hits hard.

>i was being bullied so i stood up and said what i said which doesnt mean that i act like this all the time.

The response to being bullied is _not_ to bully back. Stand your ground, certainly, but do not stoop to their level.

Cursing is just fine. Fuck fuck fuckity fuck fuck. There's no rule against cursing (unless it's a slur). There IS a rule against harassing/insulting/belittling other players though. You can say "fuck, that was close" or "fuck Rengar deals a lot of damage" as much as you want. You can't say "fuck you, you bitch" to another community member.

You started crossing that line when you called your team "fucking trash" and "idiots" -- that behavior is using curse words an an intensifier for insults, and those insults are the real issue here.
